name: Supermarket Mayhem
description:
Description

Race through the aisles of a supermarket, filling your cart with products and grabbing bonuses along the way!

Released as part of the 32bit Spring Cleaning Jam 2022.

Controls

Gameplay Controls

ActionKeyboardXbox Controller
MoveWASDLeft Thumbstick
D-Pad
Turn Left/Right
Arrow Left/Arrow Right
LB/RB
LT/RT
Right Thumbstick (Left/Right)
RunShift (Hold while moving)
B (Hold while moving)
InteractEA
View Challenge List
QBack
Pause Game
EscapeStart

ActionKeyboard

Choose Option

D-Pad

Acknowledgements

A special thank you to craigsnedeker for many of the textures and models included in the Classic64 Asset Library, and to MenacingMecha for the shaders and post-processing effects used in the Godot PSX Style Demo.

Please Note:

The Mac OSX version ( both the .dmg file and .app file) requires permissions in order to run. Go to System Preferences > Security and Privacy and click the prompt under "General" to open the .dmg file, and repeat this process to run the .app file.
